chapter.title: Setting a Spacecraft's Initial Epoch
chapter.para: You can configure the initial epoch of a Spacecraft using several time systems (TAI, TDB, UTC, etc) and in several formats (Gregorian Date, Modified Julian Date). In this How To you’ll learn how to set a spacecraft’s epoch in UTC Gregorian format. Starting from the default mission:

step.para: In the Resources tree, double-click on DefaultSC to open it.
Make sure the Orbit tab is selected
In the EpochFormat list, select UTCGregorian.
Type 04 July 2014 09:30:15.235 in the Epoch text box.
